summary: The telecommunications industry and the federal government have spent hundreds of billions of dollars to expand broadband across the U.S. While broadband is available in most urban areas, about 1 in 4 people in rural areas lack access, according to recent data. In 2019, the Federal Communications Commission and Department of Agriculture started new, multi-year broadband support programs intended to increase access in rural and...
title: Broadband: Observations on Past and Ongoing Efforts to Expand Access and Improve Mapping Data
